content.detailedDescription: Regarding submitted date of 2010-02-17 and event date 2009-11-00 - smoke & mirrors cigar type craft - having studied the ufo phenomena for 50 years- to best view this object use no more than 7x binoculars to hold subject still while viewing - other options are canons line of image stabilized binoculars, a high quality spotter scope on tripod, apo refractor telescope with wide field of view eyepiece. quality of lenses with coatings more important than magnification. best of luck +++
content.summary: Regarding smoke & mirrors cigar type craft.

content.detailedDescription: I lived in tempe arizona when i saw it. i was on my way home and in tempe behind every house theirs an ally. well i took the allys home cause it is way faster. anyway, im walking down an ally heading towards home when out of the corner of my eye i saw a orange ball kinda hidden behind a tree. i didnt think nothing of it except it must be the moon. well my mind changed quick when it moved out from that tree. i stopped instantly and just stared at it.It was nomore than 75 feet from my head and it just moved floated or hovered whatever you call it over my head. not even the slightest of a sound as if it controls sound. as it moved, my eyes moved with it.I swear to you that it seen me. the reason i know this is cause it was moving like it was the only thing around and it had no worries but all of a sudden its like it got spooked or flinched and took off from moving slow to light speed. it was moving to the left and then boom! straight up in the air so fast that it left a tracer. just like a shooting star!  i know that what i saw was definiately something thats not us. i think that i am the only one who has been that close to one before according to alot of sightings ive researched. i am extremely lucky to have seen this so upclose.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Imagine seeing a full moon but orangish glow color. i was within 50 to 75 feet from it. i know without a doubt it saw me too.

content.detailedDescription:
Smoke & mirrors cigar type craft with smoke or chemical trail

spotted over somerset.  see previous post as video would not upload.

five snail speed chemical or smoke droppers. 

hardly noticed them until we speeded up the video footage.

see also attached photos of previous sightings.
content.summary: Smoke & mirrors cigar type craft with smoke or chemical trail

content.detailedDescription: One night me and my sister were looking at the wolfman moon when all of a sudden a bright orange circle looking unknown object appeared out of nowhere.I tried to focus my telescope on it but the object was moving to fast for me to get it in the sight of my telescope. i watched it for about one minute then it disappeared. me and my sister were both stunned at what we had just seen.
content.summary: Bright orange, moving at a decently fast pace.

content.detailedDescription:
These events are taking place in margarita island, off the coast of venezuela in the southernmost part of the caribbean sea.

i was sitting in a waterfront home with a friend, looking at the night sky while my wife was inside in the bedroom, it was a very clear night full of stars when out of nowhere, a very bright light, resembling the headlight of a car, just suddenly appears above the horizon.  this happened in front of my eyes.  while we stood in awe and shock wondering what could that light be and just where it had come from, the light started moving up in a 45 degree angle and it was flying faster as the seconds went by.  after it reached a certain altitude, the object changed direction and it started to head our way.  as soon as it changed direction, i no longer saw one bright light, it was now three lights, with the exact same distance separated from each other, the light in the center was a white light while the right light was flashing red and the left light was flashing green.  they were flashing at a very high speed.  i knew we were not looking at an airplane. it was flying right into our direction and was flying low. as it flew almost over us i could now clearly see its shape, it was a perfect diamond, and from this angle i now saw four lights, one in every corner of the diamond plus one in the center that was brighter than those in the points.

as it flew over us, i was amazed that this object was absolutely silent!!!
if it would have been a plane, obviously we would have heard the loud roar of the jet engines.  i then ran in the house to get my wife, who joined me outside for further viewing.  about 20 minutes later, the object flew back from the direction it had gone earlier.  that same night, from the excitement of what we had just seen, we stayed up watching the sky until about midnight and we saw five more of these objects.  they all have one thing in common, they come from the east and fly west.  some time later, they fly back eastward from the west.

since that night on 12/25/09, we have witnessed many more recurrent ufos plus other lights that hover or levitate just over the water, say 3-4 ft over the surface.  these light shows are very amazing and impressive, as up to sixteen lights gather over the sea and flash, change colors, shapes....All in what i think is a constant communication with each other.

these events are taking place almost in a daily basis, i am urgently contacting your organization to invite you to come here and document these   truly amazing events for yourselves.  i can take you to the sites for the best viewing at the best viewing times.  i am very serious and i am not interested in wasting your time nor mine. 

please contact me as soon as possible.  if i do not hear from you within 48 hours i will contact you by telephone.  i really need you to document what is happening here, and as i said before, this is happening almost every night.  

thank you for your prompt attention to this very important matter. 

regards,

thomas colmenares
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.shape: Diamond,   Fireball,   Flash,   Sphere,   Star-like,   Triangle
content.summary: A very bright light suddenly appeared not far above the horizon, after about 15 seconds, the sphere-like light started flying up.  it then changed direction and started flying towards my direction where i was able to see its diamond shape and lights.

content.detailedDescription: I have spent a considerable amount of time researching the roswell ufo crash site and have found it's location and obtained satellite images, maps of the location and satellite images of debris in the area.  there will be a need to perform an extensive and expensive excavation of the area.   the air force has given the go ahead on letting a civillian find it and excavate it.   now that i have invested a tremendous amount of my own money on finding the object i am interested in being hired to excavate it for what ever company is interested in paying me to continue and finish my work.   i believe i have enough information to locate it now we just need to get together to begin it's excavation.  please contact me so that we can begin working on this project.
content.summary: Researched and discovered the roswell ufo space craft vehicle crash site by satellite image

content.detailedDescription:
I awoke in the middle of the night with my my head spinning so much that i felt sick. my first thought was, "did i drink? is this a hangover?" but as i was laying there i realized i hadn't had any alcohol at all.  i couldn't move - in part i think because of the spinning and inability to focus my vision - and both my arms were numb as if they had been "asleep" and were now slowly and painfully "waking up".  i then started rationalizing because of the arm numbness that perhaps i was having some sort of heart attack or something and i tried my best to calm my mind down.

when the dizziness subsided a bit i was able to get myself up into a seated position. i was feeling very nauseous and thought i'd better get downstairs in case i was going to be sick. movement was still difficult though. at that point i looked up (our bedroom is at the top of the house and there is a big window in the slanted part of the roof right above the bed) and saw this - for lack of a better description - spaceship that seemed to be just "parked" in the air about 50-100 meters above my house. from what i saw of it it was huge - i couldn't see the sides of it - and it was dark and there was a very bright pale green rectangular panel of light that was shining, although not like a beam, down on me.  there was no noise coming from it at all.  the strange thing was that as i was staring up at it, it seemed to be emanating the thought, "this is nothing, don't look here. it's nothing".   whether the "ship" really was projecting that thought or whether i was just experiencing a very human reaction to something one can't wrap one's mind around, i couldn't tell you for sure. but my experience of it was that it was sending the thought out to me. i could tell it was focused on me and "looking" at me - and i suddenly became aware of a feeling that i wasn't supposed to have awakened so quickly and for some reason at that point i became afraid. it wasn't a fear like "these people are evil", but rather it seemed to be a very primitive fear of something that was very outside my realm of experience. 

throughout all of this my husband was asleep next to me. i really don't know why i didn't think to wake him up. i think maybe it was a combination of the extreme nausea and incomprehension of what was happening.

i made my way downstairs and it was at that point that i saw that it was just before 4:00 am. i had a bit of bread to try to settle my stomach but the dizziness, while it abated a bit, didn't completely go away for another 2 or 3 days.  i sat downstairs going through everything in my mind and i was sort of trying to convince myself that it didn't happen. then a few hours later my husband came downstairs and the first thing he said was, "something very strange happened last night" and he proceeded to describe the same ship, the light (which he felt was somehow also "inside" the room), and the feeling of "this is nothing, don't look at it" coming from the ship. he had noticed i was gone (i'm assuming this is after i'd gone downstairs) then had gone back to sleep.

before this happened i was never particularly interested in ufos or aliens. i had an open mind about it but it didn't particularly matter to me and i thought people who talked about encounters were mostly just attention seekers. well this experience has changed everything. whether i was "abducted", i have no idea. but i do feel as if i'm waiting for "them" to visit again. my husband and i have got into the habit of gazing up at the sky before we go to sleep and in the weeks after this event we saw several strange things there. we saw a strangely-shaped thing with multicolored lights flying in an odd formation and we've seen several times things that almost look like stars but they are moving - not in a straight line like an aircraft or a comet, but sort of all over the place like an insect.

something else: that night when i went downstairs i had this incredibly happy feeling come over me as if "someone" were telling me not to be afraid and that everything was going to be alright. that feeling has stayed with me since this incident. i feel like whoever "they" are, the fact that they are here is a good thing. i don't feel any evil about it at all.

ps.  i've ticked the box to not agree to release this information to third parties because i'd like to know who those third parties would be first. i feel rather guarded about who i tell this experience to.

thank you
jcs
content.summary: I saw the underneath part - it was very dark and with a huge pale green panel of light.

content.detailedDescription: Trapezoidal shaped ufo with mother of pearl lights seen south of fairbanks alaska:
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Trapezoidal shaped ufo with mother of pearl lights seen south of fairbanks alaska

content.detailedDescription: At 12:55 i was driving home on hwy 377 going north i seen a bright light in the sky going so slow it did not look like it was moving the closer i got to it the better i could see it when i got even with it me going north and it going west all i could see was this big black triangle with lights all over it a lot of blues and whites the blue lights seem to be bigger than the white ones i pulled over and got out to get a better look i could tell it was no plane and was bigger than a dc10 i have ever seen anything like this in my life i dont know how it stayed in the sky as slow as it was moving i could not hear it make a sound i ran back to the car to get my cell phone to take a pic when i turned back around from the car it was gone
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Seen a black triangle shape covered in so many lights i could not count them.

content.detailedDescription:
I am submitting this for another person...

wichita kansas heading south on tyler rd. in center turning lane about to head left on 9th street.  saw what appeared to be the edge of a disc-shaped ufo directly over the intersection of central & tyler. it was bright metallic silver, about as wide as the intersection and hovered about as high above the street lights as the street lights were from the ground. she took a second look because she couldn't believe it.  it was still there. there were striated clouds all around it.  it was stationary. she thought it was a reflection at first but it didn't move when she moved.

she made her turn and circled back within 30 seconds.  it was gone.
content.summary: Silver disc edge over wichita, ks intersection central & tyler

content.detailedDescription: On february 16, 2010 around 7:30 pm cst i was watching tv and looked out my window and noticed one very bright light in the northern sky.  i immediately ran outside to get a better view and then took a picture.  i then drove about 1/4 of a mile to our local lake area in order to get a better view without treetop interference.  when i got to the lake which only took about a half of minute, the first one disappeared and then two of these bright lights were side by side and slowly approached my vehicle.  the two lights stayed at the same height and and same distance apart while moving, then all of a sudden it appeared that the lights started to move in the opposite direction.  i then followed them for about 2 miles and then they both appeared to have burned out. within seconds one more bright light appeared and continued to move away from me, and i also followed that one for about 3 miles and it seemed to have burned out. on the way home i noticed other people where also at the lake viewing the northern sky.  while attempting to write this report, two more lights appeared through my window, i then ran outside again to capture them on camera...This happened about one hour from the first encounter.  both lights appeared to stay stationary and burned out after about a minute, then another one appeared, but this one moved slowly and burned out about after one minute or so.  i was not scared, more curious and wanting to capture it on camera.  just makes me wonder, what or who is out there?
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.shape: Bullet,   Missile,   Circle,   Egg,   Fireball,   Oval,   Sphere,   Star-like,   Teardrop
content.summary: Strange lights above vernon lake

content.detailedDescription:
I was visiting my family for sunday lunch and was in the living room with my sister and niece when a pink/red light caught my attention out the window. at first i thought it may have been the light from the crane that is in that direction but when i noticed it moving i rushed outside into the back garden to take a closer look. 

i was suprised to see a black round/disc shaped craft that had what looked like a pink/red spotlight that moved about from top, bottom and either sides of the craft (which was about the size of a large helicopter). this i thought was highly strange. there was no sound coming from the craft and was at low altitude, lower that the helicopters normally fly in this area. at first it was heading north in my direction whilst moving its spotlight around. then it changed direction and began moving east at a steady speed. i began fiming after a few seconds as luckily i had a digital camera with a video function in my pocket. 

after about 30 seconds the craft turned the pink/red light off and i could clearly see the blackness of the craft. my heart was pounding in my chest at this point. it started to pick up speed and i lost sight of it behind the rooftops up the hill. this sighting lasted about 2-3 minutes. 

i ran inside to show my sister the footage then headed back outside and spotted another craft travelling the same path (in a northely direction) 5-10 minutes after the first one i saw. this one had the same behaviour as the first and i decided to use the flash on my camera to try and get their attention. (they were low down underneath cloud cover) after the first flash from my camera they dimmed the pink/red light down, then after the second flash they turned the light off completely and the black object seemed to increase in size, (maybe lowering altitude?) it hovered stationary for no more than 5 seconds, then began heading south in the oposite direction. i ran after it but lost sight of it after i went inside to grab my coat. a truelly memorable evening!

i have footage of both crafts although the first one was the only one that turned out visible when i watched them back on the computer.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 2 black round/disc shaped objected spotted over newbury each with a pink/red spotlight that moved about the crafts

content.detailedDescription:
Went outside for a cig. on the back patio / crystal clear blue sky and no clouds or stars or moon in sight ..... and in looking up and around in the sky i sighted what appeared to be, i'd find out later in looking into it, a classic orange glowing orb. it appeared totally out of place in both size, color, placement, brightness....It appeared much larger than the passing jet that my wife and i got to see pass in front of it ....That is between us and the object. it hung about 45 degrees looking south from clinton, ms for about 10 minutes by which time my wife had grown bored with it....And in a blink....It was gone from sight. just gone.

see attached ... it looked exactly as shown.

w
content.summary: Sighted ufo hanging stationary south of clinton

content.detailedDescription: While walking to work at cfb cold lake this morning i seen a gold in color object heading towards me over the air base at about 2000 meters up. it came from the south south west and changed direction and headed over cold lake south. and it then headed east, this was 30 min before sunrise.  i have been in the airforce for 13 + years and this was no plane or jet. the airbase was quiet when i got to work 20 min later, with no flights in or out. this was no plane. it made no noise, just bright gold color star that moved slow and disapeard to the east over cold lake south.
content.summary: Gold color star moved from moved in half circle formation about 2000 meters up

content.detailedDescription:
A friend and i were grilling steaks on our back deck and admiring the beautiful night sky. there were clouds, but very high up. it was windy, from the northwest. my friend first noticed three configurations of five red lights each, steady and not blinking. they were close to a mile up in altitude, and some distance away, over new hampshire on the east side of the connecticut river. we were situated near the top of cobb hill with a clear view of the area in which these lights appeared to be situated. the groups were far apart, at least fifty to a hundred yards. they were positioned one over the other, but not in a straight line, the middle group being to the right of a straight line between the top and bottom groups. what was noticeable was that the lights did not move relative to the ground or relative to each other for close to five minutes; they just hung there in the air. i left my friend and went inside to get the others in our group. by the time i returned, probably twenty seconds later, my friend said that the lights just left almost instantly just before we had come outside.
we speculated as to what the lights might have been. they were much too high to be something tethered to the ground. if they were aircraft or helicopters they would have moved, at least relative to each other. they were too far apart to be lights from the same vessel of any kind. we could not come up with a reasonable explanation. 
the sighting was not frightening, but puzzling. neither my friend nor i have ever seen or reported a sighting of any kind before. i don't drink and he had had less than one beer. neither of us uses drugs nor is either of us on any kind of suspect medication that might have affected our senses or perceptions, and we saw exactly the same thing.
content.summary: Sighting of three groups of red lights stationary in the sky and relative to each other.

content.detailedDescription:
I was on route to food store,the traffic was very light,i saw a flash of light in sky about mile and a half away,about 700 feet up.The object looked like it was coming down,could not see any tail as in a jet,nor wings of any.It was light breezy,no clouds near by,could not hear sound
of it for the occational car passing by,birds singing ect...The object
moved rapidly,faster then any jet or prop plane would in a landing formation.The object appeared to look like a silvery rope with elongated eggs,one in middle the other at the near end.It seem to be turning from
antelope road to watt avenue,that is near mc clellan air force bace.I saw no smoke or the trail there of,i saw no wings nor tail of such jet ect...
the object was moving rather fast at a steep decline and sort of blended in to the sky.... well.The object looked long,perhaps 450 feet long to as long as 720 ft long.The time i saw this object was at 10:40 this morning
in sacramento,california for about 22 seconds long.I was surprised at the speed it was traveling,no sonic boom,no roaring of a jet or prop engin.It
looked in likeness of a centepeed,with a rope or braeded body.
content.summary: Silvery--rope with two elongated silver egg shapes,in middle and at the end

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were going to jack in the box around 7:00 pm.  she was driving.  out my passenger-side window, i saw what looked like a plane's lights.  this was over a residential neighborhood about about 1/2 mile away.  at first i saw a "root beer" colored light that was not bright but bigger than any star or planet. as soon as i started watching it, i saw it jerk to the right, turn to a dull white color and then disappear.  a second later it appeared again as a red light, about the same size as when it was "root beer" colored.  it was moving about the speed you would expect a plane to be moving.  all of a sudden it took a dive like a roller coaster when it goes down that first steep plunge. i estimate that it plunged 100 feet.  at the bottom it looped back and returned to it's initial altitude. the entire maneuver took two seconds or less.  when i saw dive, it really got the adrenalin going.  i knew innately that this was a much too radical maneuver for a plane.  for one thing, it's against faa regulations for planes to be flying like that over a city.  i lost sight of the object when we drove past some buildings.
content.summary: Apparent airplane seen at night, over a city, takes a violent dip of approx. 100 feet in two seconds, then bounces back to original altitude.

content.detailedDescription:
My mother was driving myself to school and had two of her work friends in the car also, we where driving east to south east from the small township of cumnock towards orange, a much larger country city in central west new south wales, australia. i was in the rear seat behind mum who was driving, the ufo was on the right side of the car as we drove past so i had a clear view.
we where about halfway between the township of molong and orange when i noticed in the distance a glow on the side of a small hill, at first i thought it was the sun refecting of a new tin roof but i had not noticed it before so looked out of place, it was very visible to west bound traffic and would have had anyones attention. 
as we drove closer to and rounded the bend i saw this very large disc object with 3 what looked like normal human being around the ufo, one was walkiing towards the road to the fence line, i didnt say anything but looked at mum and the front passanger and both where looking in the same direction as the object but we said nothing, the passenger next to me was looking out the other window so would not have seen anything. for me i  didnt want to say anything incase they didnt see the same thing but i am sure they would have, it was easily seen by anyone in the front seat or looking to the right in the back seat going west, being only 14 i didnt think anyone would beleive what i saw so have kept quite till a few years ago.
two of the beings, for want of a better word, where standing either side of the craft holding something as was the third being. the ufo would had to of been at least the size of a large flat bed truck, about 15 - 20 mtrs in length, it had landed next to large dead tree and was about the same hieght as the tree, approx 6-8 mtrs, it was the shape of a disc with a bulge in the middle. it had landed on the edge of the small hill the road went around so the top of it was what i had seen from a distance. i couldnt believe my eyes when i saw the whole object let alone the 3 being around it. when i saw the being walking towards the fence line which ran along the side of the road i am sure we where looking at each other, i will never forget him looking at our car as we drove past. we where driving slow around the corner which gave plenty of time to take in as much as i could before loosing sight of it further up the road.
i can still picture it as if i had just seen it.
it was not a reflection as i first thought or a mist, i know what i saw was very real and i am sure other people driving to work in either direction would have seen the same thing, driving west it would have been seen for a lot longer from a distance, in the other direction it would not have been seen until the corner. they looked too human to be alien, it is my firm belief they where from another planet, our cars may have been a curiosity, the beings would have been around 6feet tall, maybe be a little more, when the being walked towards the fence line he was close enough to the fence for me to see he would have been close to a couple of feet taller than the fence and the others where just as tall.
i since found out there was a few reports of sightings around 1972 about the same time of year. i was going to school in orange from 1971 to 1972, but am sure it was 1972 and with the cooler weather i am thinking it would have been around march to april. at the time i was in very good health with no sight, hearing problems.
content.summary: White glowing like you would have if a fluro light is turned on outside in daylight, 3 human like people standing around disc in similar glowing like suite..

content.detailedDescription: I woke up around 5:31. as i walked back to turn my heater up i saw a bright object that seemed to me looked like a star. i rubbed my eyes just to make sure it wasn't me seeing things and it was still there. it kept hovering from side to side with a bright white/yellowish glow which faded in and out as it was doing this motion. i wanted to rule out anything it could of been. i ruled out  a helicopter most of them have small green and red lights around the tails and rotors, so there for it would not lite up the whole chopper itself, plane, hmm no there's not a plane that can go side by side and hover that i know of. the area it appeared seemed to be in the next county over or this object was way over the gulf of mexico at a high altitude. this occured over 15mins. i tryed to grab my nightvision scope, but when i got back the object was gone. if you've ever played with adobe photoshop with the lense flare effect. that kinda sums up what it looked like
content.summary: Fireball over gulf of mexico?

content.detailedDescription:
Background
as a relaxing hobby, i enjoy taking pictures of various cloud formations, storms etc. 

event time:
jan 26th 2010 at 4:54pm 

event location:
addison texas at the intersection of arapaho and monfort

i parked in the lot across from a walmart to snap a few cloud photos. i did not see or notice any planes /crafts or lighting in the sky, all normal. only later that day, as i reviewed the photos, i found the ufo? object on one of the photos.
content.summary: I take pictures of cloud formations as a hobby, found this ufo? object during a review of the pics.

content.detailedDescription: It was dark out and my son wanted a toy out of the car.  i told him (8 yrs. old) go ahead and run out and get it honey im right here.(still inside)  i heard the car door shut and he came running in saying he saw 4 lights in the sky that look like a ufo.  always being a believer, i still was like sure hhoney lets go look.  i stood there in shock trying to come up with another explanation of what i was seeing.  i couldnt see details because it wass enclosed in a cloud of mist or something, way to low to be a cloud.  it was very low what seemed to be maybe 40 ft, but probably more.  i saw 4 big lights shining from within the mist.  they were 4 different colors.  the shade of color coming through the clouds was blue pink green clear.  this object was of considerable size and just hovered silently over my neighbors house. i began to feel a sense of unknowing fear because my son was still outside with me. i grabbed his arm and pulled him inside still in a state of i guess shock.  it was a very strange feeling and even stranger i didnt react the way i thought i would if i had seen something like that.  i came inside told my boyfriend to look but didnt take me seriously a brushed it off.  not a believer. i then just remember sitting on the couch scared and peeking out my side door to see if it was there.  im guessing it remained for probably another ten minutes.  i amshocked that i never picked up the phone to call my dad who probably would have drove over to see.  i get a weird feeling of just kinda blanking out.  even stranger, i didnt remember to tell anyone for a couple of days, which is very strange for me!  my neighbors were retired nuns who had lived there for years.  i never asked them about it out of embarrassment, but wish i had.  i noticed some injuries that they said was a surgery, but it was odd that they up and moved back to their perish.  i wish i would have said something to them because it drives me crazy not knowing now.  dont have any memory of the rest of the night.  its like it escaped my mind until a couple days later when my boyfriend was making fun of what i said i saw and then i felt really weird, like how could i forget something like that.  this is an issue that i have been drawn to my whole life.  more of an obsession, now that i have actually seen one, i cant stop thinking about all the mysteries of this world.  i must know the truth!  i hope we have answers soon!
content.summary: My son said, mommy there is 4 lights in the sky that look like a ufo!  i went outside and it had to be a ufo!

content.detailedDescription: Please add this attached picture to case 18817 file (long term visitation). more details from: http://ufo-spacelife.Blogspot.Com/
content.summary: Two pictures of invisible night objects

content.detailedDescription: On or about march 15 1966,i left my home at about 7 p.M.To visit a friend who lived across a park from where i lived,while walking through this park i looked upto the sky and to my amazement i observed three(about moon size lights,disk shaped)they were a red orange in a triangular formation moveing very slowly in a south east direction,the sky was partly cloudy,the lights were nearly motionless,they than began forming what i would call geometric patterns,they formed in a circle revolving in a counter clock wise motion then forming in a straight line and again revolving in a counter clock wise movement with the center object acting as a hub.One of the lights then took off to the south horizon at an unbelivle speed it remained there for a moment then returned again at a fantastic speed to the other two lights they again resumed to go into the aformentioned patterns.I observed this for about five minuets,i belived the entire sighting lasted for app.Half an hour.I was not sure what to think as i have not seen anything like this in my life(nor have i since)i recall thinking the world as we know it will never be the same again.There were bullitens issued on a major t.V. station requesting viewers to please not call the station as their switch boards were jammed with reports,adding they had no information on these lights,but would report when they did.There were no following reports,until a few days later in a very short article burried deep in the paper stateing that the lights were the results of a gas experment that took place in new jersey.That was all there was reported on this sighting.I was ninteen years old at the time,and blessed with 20-10 vision,this memory still vexes me even to this day.Thank you sam verdier
content.summary: Three moon size disk shape-orange red

content.detailedDescription: We were looking for sky lab,  we had heard that it might come through the atmosphere as it's orbit was degrading.  that night the moon was full which made seeing this huge craft very easy.   it came from the north heading south toward medicine lake california. i estimate that the height of the trees  to be around 200 feet in this area making it easy to judge height.  you could clearly make out the metallic body and see light coming out of the windows.  the shape of the craft was strange. it looked like a bunch of shipping containers offset from one another and the end looked like a giant carpenters square.  we thought this was skylab and never said much about it until years later when i figured out satellites are small pin pricks of light.  recently, i was looking through utube and found something that co-oberates my story, a sighting that three astronauts witnessed: a large ufo while in skylab in 1973 they estimated the craft around 800 to 900 ft.
content.summary: It looked like many shipping containers set in a row but offset

content.detailedDescription:
I have been an avid stargazer for 5 years now and have seen many different objects in the night sky which to my knowledge can be identified as celestial 
or man made such as meteors, iridium flares and a host of others.  however there seems to be this one anomaly that i can't logically deduce!  this is not the first time i have observed these events.  the latest was early morning on the 14 of feb.  i woke early to gaze as i find it easier to spot satellites when i saw 2 lights which looked to be stars moving together from
west to southwest at 45 degrees just south of ursa major (big dipper). at first i thought my eye's were playing that trick created when there's nothing in the background which makes them seem to dance around. not the case 
here as they moved a considerable distance in one direction then stopped then
changed orientation from one another while keeping an equal distance between them.  there also seemed to be 2 faint lights which faded in and out that appeared to be connected in some way.  it's like there's an invisible object using some sort of cloaking to either mimic a few stars traversing the sky or 
rendering transparent so as to see through it.  i am now reading an increase
on these particular sightings.  fascinating to say the least.  after close observation of at least 10 of these sightings in the past year, i have yet to
come to a logical explanation. last bit here, they appear to be within or very close to our atmosphere as i can almost make out a shape and see contour 
to see around whatever they are.
content.summary: 3 star like objects moving in unison & changing orientation & maintaining equal distance

content.detailedDescription:
Was driving south on ronald regan parkway near bethesda park exit. saw about 20 orange, translucent spheres through trees. pulled off the road. there were 4 other cars pulled of the road watching as well. the spheres were moving in random patterns. then one by one they aligned in single file and moved up into the air. they seemed to each vanish one after the other into the same spot in the air.

it was a clear night, with a few clouds. the spheres went into the low clouds, again, in single file, one at a time and vanished.

there was virtually no sound.

the spheres were like "bubbles" that were orange on the outside with a darker red center.

totally sureal.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 20 orange sphere's moving randomly then move single file into air and vanished one at a time into the same spot

content.detailedDescription: I was in my bedroom at 22:45 which overlooks the front of the house and has a clear view of the sky north towards central london when heard a car screetching loudly outside somwhere so i  looked out the window but didnt see the car but as turned to walk away from the window i noticed a bright light pulsatin blue red and yellow (but in more of a sequence of a few blue and reds and then one yelollow and so on) in the distance above the house line, the sky was mostly clear with a couple of patches of cloud that was quite well illuminated by what i presumed to be the moon but i could noy actuall see the moon itself. straight away i realised this was like nothing i had ever seen before. the light appeared to be moving quickly directly from west to east and approx 2 miles in the distance, low altitude but above the low cloud and was still visable faintly even when it went behind the patches of cloud. the object was visable for around 45 seconds until it was finaly out of sight. as the object left sight another object appeared in a almost the samplce the previous object had appeared and then proceeded to move towards the west in the opposite direction slowly and then just vanished without moving out of site. this second object which appeared identicle to the first was only visable for around 10-15 seconds before it dissapeared. neither object made any sound and definatly were not planes or helicopters as there where no winglights front beams or tail lights just on single point of light pulsating on and off. the skies are extremly busy of this part of london a plane goes over the house every couple of minutes at low and high altitudes so am very familiar with the appearance of planes and heicopters and this was not either.
content.summary: A pulsating lights flashing red blue and yellow travelling quickly with no audible sound

content.detailedDescription:
1963. hitch hiking across the state of tennessee. west to east. it approched me from a star filled sky, yet very distinct from other stars in sky. it focused onto me walking on a desolate hiway. as it drew closer to me i had the feeling it was stalking me as a individual. it came to me as close as 25 feet. i became frightened and ran under a bridge overpass.
it continued to follow me. in the distance i could hear a group of people far belowm the hiway on a seconedary road with out buildings. i was frightened but do not recall why. i had the feeling it intended me no harm. i shouted out. no response from the people below.

perhaps 3 -4 hours later i awoke in stranger's house. to me, only minutes had passed sinse the encounter under the bridge. i dressed and left, continuing on to washington dc. that has been many years ago.
 
 at age 67, i now live in the mountains of westwern north carolina. 
the globe has returned. it follows me every where. if i park in a lot of a local store, it waits for me to to resume my jouney. i don't know what it wants from me. it just follow me silently and often sits just above my home in the darkness of night.

im am of sound mind and body. i served in the military, followed by thirty years as a paramedic for a local govwernment. 

i am not senile nor comprimized in any fashion.

 i do not know what this globe wants from me. it has to date, not offered any reason to fear it. it is though it wants tyo talk to me, yet there remains some type of inteligble contact. 

what should i do ?

i failed to mention that it sometimes hovers over the roof of my house and makes a very low, yet distinct humming sound til daylight, then gone.
content.summary: Round dome slightly larger then a basket ball

content.detailedDescription: Just looking up at the nice clear sky over sunnyvale, ca, and noticed a string of lights, very dim, dont know if lit on own or reflecting city lights.  the objects were heading south, from where i was, off of elcamino real, about 2 miles east of hwy 85, i'd say they were directly over mountain view and continued over cupertino and saratoga.  the objects constantly changed their grouping, first all in a row (not a perfect straight line but still together) then the seperated into 3 groups, 10 (rough number) the other two groups larger then they all merged back together and and near the end of the sighting, they all seemed to cluster together tightly (i'd say they were over the cupertino/saratoga hills at this point) and they faded out, hence why i think they were not luminous but reflecting the city lights.  i saw a small plane fly by, it was definetly lower in elevation, but you could see the aviation light flashing, using that the elevation was higher, but i could not guess at what level, and the objects made no sound.
content.summary: 30-40 low lit objects flying south over west side of santa clara co.

content.detailedDescription:
5 p.M. feb. 13  pasadena, ca

looked up to do some bird watching and noticed a triangular shape way up in the sky.  the triangle was made by three globes -- white and reddish.  next to the triangle at the widest side were two globes reddish that were next to it.  this was a very large formation that was there for only about 30 seconds -- it was stationary and did not move.  silent.  i got up to get my camera and then changed my mind and went back to see it again, and it was gone. it was definitely there and unlike any formation i have ever seen.

you can call me if you like at 323 254-4997

cathy
pasadena, ca
content.summary: Triangle formation with spheres
